title: White Knight
description: New York Times bestselling author Meghan March continues the story of untold truths and one man’s redemption in the Dirty Mafia Duet.I never expected to be anyone’s white knight. That’s not a role I’ve ever played.But when the Casso crime family shifts into uncharted territory, they’re looking for a new hero, and they’re looking for me—Cannon Freeman, the black sheep.But my time in disgrace is at an end.It’s my turn to rise up and save the people who matter most to me.Even if my family has never given a damn about me, I will not let them fall.More than anything, I will not let her fall.White Knight is the second book in the Dirty Mafia Duet and should be read after Black Sheep, book one.
author: Meghan March
